Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~muralisr Would it be possible for chaincode shim GetTxTimestamp() to pull the timestamp from the proposal header (which SDK also uses for the ultimate tran proposal header)

Action.author: kletkeman
Action.body: Yes, the tx timestamp has been used by our chaincode ever since Binh put the function into the stub. But in v1, the changes in protocol caused someone to toss that code, although the stub interface stayed. The proposal timestamp is presumably going to be used for all copies of the transaction in the chain, so it is perfect for this use case.
